values.value: 1. The following cancellation policies and procedures will apply to any Virtual Courses and Onsite Courses: 1.1. Rescheduling and/or refund requests made 21 full calendar days or less prior to the start date of the class are not available and not refundable; 1.2. Rescheduling requests made more than 21 days prior to the start date of the class will be charged a 25% change fee. Date must be chosen at the time of rescheduling. A rescheduled class must start no later than six (6) months after the initial class start date. 1.3. If a student does not attend a scheduled session (no show), payment for the session is forfeited. The student may not reschedule the session.
